product_name: Sunday Organics Veggie & Tomato Garden Plant Food
description:
Grow more organic veggies this year

Sunday Organics Veggie & Tomato is an organic liquid plant food for fruits, vegetables, herbs, and more.

Made from organic upcycled ingredients, this powerful plant food goes to work fast. Its bio-digested formula is rich in beneficial microbes and nutrients, which promote immediate nutrient uptake, improve plant health, and enrich the soil sustainably. And its liquid formula makes it easy to apply to seedlings, containers, raised beds, and more.

At Sunday, we create organic garden solutions without harsh chemicals—so you can get your hands dirty—not your plants.

sections.product_features:
3-3-4 NPK (nitrogen-phosphorus-potassium) organic liquid plant food
OMRI-listed — organic gardening approved
Highly absorbable nutrients for plant and soil quality
Increases garden yield*
Supports seedling development
No fishy odor — smells like earthy molasses
Made for containers, raised beds, and in-ground plants
Easy application with watering can
Includes 32 oz. plant food concentrate
Bottle covers up to 200 sq. ft.
sections.ingredients:
Corn steep liquor: Provides highly absorbable macronutrients for fruit production, flowering, and overall plant growth
Fermented fish by-product: Essential nutrients for fruit production, flowering, and root development
Sulfate of potash: For all-around plant health, vitality, and soil nutrient levels
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply in the early morning or late afternoon.
Shake well and mix plant food into a watering can. For starter plants: 2 oz. or 4 tbsp. per gallon of water. For mature plants: 4 oz. or ½ cup per gallon of water.
For starter plants: 2 oz. or 4 tbsp. per gallon of water.
For mature plants: 4 oz. or ½ cup per gallon of water.
Apply to soil and plants according to square footage or 4-5 seconds per plant.
Reapply every 2-14 days during the growing season, depending on plant size.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Yard Advisors:
How does Sunday Organics Veggie & Tomato plant food work?
This effective yet gentle formula uses a Progressive Digestion Process (PDP), where heat-loving microbes break down organic waste into nutrients that plants can readily absorb. This creates a nutrient-rich formula that gets to work quickly without harming your plants.
What plants can I use Sunday Organics Veggie & Tomato plant food on?
Really, any plant in your garden! Sunday Organic Veggie and Tomato plant food can be used on fruit and flower-bearing plants, herbs, vegetables, berries—even trees*.
*apply at a higher rate: 4 oz- 8oz per gallon of water
How often should I apply Sunday Organics Veggie & Tomato plant food?
This depends on plant maturity and growth stage:
Mature plants: 1x per 1-2 weeks
Starter plants: 1x per week
Seedlings: 1x every 2 days
Is Sunday Organics Veggie & Tomato plant food sustainable?
You bet it is. Sunday Organics Veggie & Tomato plant food is made from nutritious organic by-products that may otherwise end up in landfills and produced in a solar-powered facility.
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
Pending in FL & VA
